title: Kansas City Shooting: 4 Killed and 5 Others Wounded at Bar
text:
The Kansas City police were investigating a mass shooting on Sunday after an attacker walked into a bar and opened fire, killing four people and wounding five others in the predawn hours.

The motive for the mass shooting at Tequila KC, a small bar on Central Avenue in downtown Kansas City, Kan., was not immediately clear.

The Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, an arm of the Justice Department, said agents in Kansas City were responding to the shooting.

Thomas Tomasic, a spokesman for the Kansas City Police Department, said the emergency call came in at 1:27 a.m. on Sunday.
description: The attacker opened fire at a small bar in Kansas overnight Sunday, the police said. The motive was not clear and a search for the assailant was underway.
